title: For Sale/Trade:  Norinco SKS. All black. Stock. Foregrip. 30rd mag. FS/FT
postcontent:
Hello everyone. 
I have a Norinco SKS with a collapsible stock, fore grip, and supposedly a 30 round magazine that I can fit 35 rounds in. The gun shoots 7.62 ammo and is actually very fun shoot. It has more stopping power then .223 but still easy for anyone to shoot. My girlfriend shoots with me all the time and loves it. The SKS has a rail on top if you wanted to put a scope or red dot on it. I know some people like to do it but I never had a problem with the stock sights. 

I'm looking to sell this but I also wouldn't be opposed to a trade for a handgun or different rifle. There is nothing wrong with the gun, but just like everyone else who owns guns does, I like to trade and get different stuff after a while. I have put approximately 200-300rds through the gun, and the guy I purchased from said he put about the same. 

Let me know what you have.

Thanks for looking


Derek

title: For Sale/Trade:  2-6x28B Mini- Scope Kit for Ruger 10/22 (1022) Rifles and Carbines
postcontent:
Kit Includes: 2-6x28MM VARIABLE POWER MINI-SCOPE,
 RUGER 10/22 PICATINNY RAIL SCOPE MOUNT, ONE INCH SCOPE RINGS -and installation instructions.

$69.00 Includes Free Shipping

HOW TO ORDER:

To order this scope kit please reply to this ad with scope kit ID number (MN2628B), your name and USPS MAILING address. We will email you a PayPal purchase invoice for $69.00 with instructions on how to pay with your PayPal account or a credit card through PayPal. As an alternative you can send a USPS Money Order with the purchase information to our address which will be included in the invoice.

$69.00 Includes Free Priority Mail Shipping to Any US Address 


= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =
NO FIREARMS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS SALE !!
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =

The Ruger 10/22 is one of the most popular 22 rifles in the world and many types of scopes are available for this handy little carbine. Compact and mini-scopes being manufactured today rival the performance of full size scopes while offering lighter weight and smaller profiles. These features make them ideal for rim fire and other small caliber sporting rifles and, even though the eye relief on these mini-scopes equals that of the full size scopes, they do present a problem. Because of their short length, they need to be mounted further back on the receiver to maintain proper eye relief.

Most Weaver style scope mounts were made to accommodate full size scopes on high power rifles and don’t work well on smaller 22s. Until recently, there were few mounts made that could effectively accommodate the shorter mini-scopes while still maintaining proper eye relief. We have a unique, reversible Picatinny rail scope mount for the Ruger 10/22 rim fire rifle that can be installed in two positions. In the forward position it accommodates the longer full size scopes and when the mount is reversed, a mini-scope can be mounted further back to obtain a full field of view.

We installed this Picatinny rail mount on several of our Ruger 10/22s and mounted a variety of fixed and variable power mini-scopes using different types and brands of scope rings. The result of these experiments were several Ruger 10/22 packages, including this kit, which offer great values for hunters and target shooters.

Leave the power set on 2x or 3x in the field and you’re ready for close-in fast moving targets. As the target range increases, turn the magnification ring up to a higher power and you are ready for longer shots. For those really long shots at smaller targets, turn the power ring up to the full 6X power.

The mil-dot reticle can be used to estimate the range to your target and the smaller scope profile makes it easier to carry your Ruger 10/22 in the field or fit it into a scabbard or gun case.

We test different scope and mount combinations on RIFLES until we find a scope package that works best for a particular rifle and application - and this is a great combination of a mini-scope and mounting system for your Ruger 10/22. 

This mini-scope package is also an ideal application for your Ruger 10/22 Take-Apart rifle as the scope does not need to be removed when the rifle is disassembled. 

SCOPE SPECIFICATIONS:
+ Magnification: 2~6x Wide Angle Variable Power 
+ Objective Lens: 28mm 
+ One Inch Tube 
+ Weight:  8.70 Ounces 
+ Length: 6.89 inches 
+ Reticle: P4 Range Estimating Mil-Dot 
+ Eye Relief – 3 inches 
+ Windage & Elevation: 1 Click = 1/4" @100 Yards 
+ Multi-Coated Blue Lenses 
+ Bright Optics 
+ Sharp Focusing 
+ Matte Black Finish
+ Eye Piece Focus Lock Ring 
+ Nitrogen Filled - Fog and Water Proof 
+ Shock Proof – Heavy Duty Recoil Design 
+ Protective Lens Caps Included 
+ New in Box 
+ Limited Lifetime Warranty **

PICATINNY RAIL MOUNT SPECIFICATIONS:
+ Black anodized one piece aluminum Picatinny rail.
+ This is a TRUE Picatinny rail, not a modified scope mount.
+ Accepts all Weaver style rings
+ Mount dimensions are 4 5/8 inches long and ¾ inch wide. The four mounting holes are in the same pattern as the standard Ruger factory drilled and tapped receiver holes for a perfect fit.
+ Mounting screws are included.
+ New Mount with Manufacturer’s One Year Replacement Warranty

RINGS SPECIFICATIONS:
+ Lightweight Non-slip Aluminum
+ Matte Black Finish
+ One Inch Diameter
+ Medium Height
+ Fits Standard Weaver and Picatinny Rail Bases
+ New Scope Rings with Manufacturer’s One Year Replacement Warranty
+ Note: Rings Style May Vary Slightly from those shown in Photos
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =
PLEASE READ TERMS OF WARRANTIES BEFORE ORDERING!!
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =

REPLACEMENT WARRANTIES:
The individual components of this SCOPE KIT are warranted by their respective manufacturers to be free of defects for reasons of workmanship and/or defective materials. The warranties do not cover damage caused by improper installation, abuse or accidents and no other warranties are offered or implied. If one or more of the components fails to function properly and/or is found to be otherwise defective it/they will be repaired or replaced as follows:

NOTE: Please contact the SELLER for instructions regarding the return of any defective components for warranty replacement.

+ Scope: Buyer must return scope to the manufacturer for inspection and testing. If found to be defective, the manufacturer will repair or replace the scope and return it directly to the purchaser.

+ Scope Rings: Buyer must return the scope rings to the seller for inspection and testing. If found to be defective, the seller will replace the rings and return them directly to the purchaser.

+ No other warranties are offered or implied and cash refunds are NOT offered by the seller.

SHIPPING: 

+ We do not have a store where orders can be picked up - Orders are shipped by USPS Domestic Priority Mail within three business days after receipt of payment to the address specified in your PayPal payment.
+ Please insure that your address and telephone number are correct.
+ We print shipping labels, tracking data and postage on the US Post Office web site.
+ If you have a street address, but your mail is delivered to a US Post Office Box, please use the US Post Office Box as your mailing address.
+ Address should be certified by PayPal. If NOT certified, we will ship to the address specified by PayPal, but will not be responsible for shipping to the wrong address.

If unsatisfied with our products or service, please notify us immediately so that we can resolve any issues you may have.

Thank you for purchasing our scope kits.

title: For Sale:  Hirtenberger .308, 146 gr light match/boxerprimed
location: NE - S.A. (10 at DeZavala), San Antonio, Texas
postcontent:
I am only down here for another few days visiting our Daughter and then headed back to Minnesota, but I have two (2) battlepacks of Hirtenberger .308 with me (brought it down for a sale that fell through) so I figured I might as well see if anyone in San Antonio might need this fine light match ammo.

Each battlepack is 200 rounds (10 boxes of 20 rounds each) - one battlepack is sealed and I opened the other for the pics. Green lacquered primers are Boxer, non-corrosive and relaodable. The date on the headstamp is 82. This ammo was made in Austria and is really GOOD STUFF!

Do your research - this stuff hasn't been available for years and has match grade 146 grain bullets, very consistent match grade brass and is very accurate and consistent.
With the scarce long range special purpose M118 and the National Match ammo going for $1.50 to $1.75 a round (and up!!), my price of $250.00 cash per battlepack puts this at $1.25 per round....about the same as a lot of the cheap Wolf ball you see for sale, but much MUCH better ammo here. There is a lot of surplus M80 ball, some nice, some dirty, lots of cheap wolf and corrosive stuff out there but the funny thing is that mine is cheaper than any of it and it's probably the best quality for sale!

Again, do your research (Google Hirtenberger) and then look around to see if you can find this anywhere else....if you do it will either be more money or the ad you are looking at is 12 years old and the ammo is long-gone!.

Just $250.00 cash per 200 round battlepack - these both will go fast.

Thanks for looking.

title: For Sale/Trade:  FEG AMD-65 AK-47
postcontent:
I have a TGI imported Hungarian AMD-65 AK-47 that I would like to trade for an AR-15. 
This is not a century built AK, this is a Hungarian imported AK with all matching numbers. Top notch quality. Only modification I've made is I attached a rail and vertical grip on the front hand guard as the original setup is cumbersome when it comes to 30-40 round magazines. The fore grip is a Mission first tactical with an internal compartment for batteries, etc. (it can still be put back to original format for the purists out there). And a tapco SAW pistol grip. 
I've fired exactly 120 rounds through it for a function test and cleaned/lubed it afterwards. Surprisingly accurate for a short barreled AK. This would be a great start for someone wanting to SBR it, as the barrel extension/muzzle break is removed after a factory spot weld is taken off. 

this is a package deal, it will come with 6 mags, 400 rounds of ammunition, front sight tool and spare parts along with 2 sets of original pistol grips, spare hammer assembly and a magazine that needs a new follower. Original box and all that comes with it.

I have a Norinco SKS with a collapsible stock, fore grip, and supposedly a 30 round magazine that I can fit 35 rounds in. The gun shoots 7.62 ammo and is actually very fun shoot. It has more stopping power then .223 but still easy for anyone to shoot. My girlfriend shoots with me all the time and loves it. The SKS has a rail on top if you wanted to put a scope or red dot on it. I know some people like to do it but I never had a problem with the stock sights.

Compact and mini-scopes being manufactured today rival the performance of full size scopes while offering lighter weight and smaller profiles. These features make them ideal for rim fire and other small caliber sporting rifles. The eye relief on these mini-scopes equals that of many full size scopes, but because of their short length they have to be mounted further back on the receiver to maintain proper eye relief. 

We have a Picatinny rail top mount for the Ruger 10/22 rifle that mounts further back on the receiver to accommodate mini-scopes in obtaining a full field of view. This four power scope, with it’s Range Finder reticle, can be used to estimate the range to your target and the smaller scope profile makes it easier to carry your Ruger 10/22 in the field or fit it into a scabbard or gun case.

This mini-scope kit is an economical and functional accessory for Ruger 10/22 rifles and especially for the Ruger Take-Apart rifle as the scope does not need to be removed when the rifle is disassembled and stored.

+ Mount and Rings: Buyer must return the mount and/or rings to the seller for inspection and testing. If found to be defective, the seller will replace the mount and/or rings and return them directly to the purchaser.

+ No other warranties are offered or implied and cash refunds are not offered by the seller.

SHIPPING: 

We do not have a store where you can pick up orders. . . orders are shipped by USPS Domestic Priority Mail within three business days after receipt of payment to the address specified in your PayPal payment.
+ Please insure that your address and telephone number are correct.
+ We print shipping labels, tracking data and postage on the US Post Office web site.
+ If you have street address, but your mail is delivered to a US Post Office Box, please use the US Post Office Box as your mailing address.
+ Address should be certified by PayPal. If NOT certified, we will ship to the address specified by PayPal, but will not be responsible for shipping to the wrong address.

If unsatisfied with our products or service, please notify us immediately so that we can resolve any issues you may have.

Thank you for purchasing our scope kits.

Ronhart International
Monument, CO

title: For Sale/Trade:  Double Barrel Shotgun 20 Ga
postcontent:
Eastern Arms Company 101.7 has the 5100 action.
This is a 20 Ga shotgun. The internals have been polished and it breaks very crisp.  
Sears Model 101.7 = Stevens Model 311

About 1929, J. Stevens Arms Co. changed from using the Riverside Arms Co. to Springfield Arms Co. name for their lower priced line. About 1930, they added a lower priced gun using the G.S. Lewis action called the Springfield No. 311 with a plain uncheckered stock. The G.S. Lewis action used coil-spring driven strickers, and the rear pin in the action sits higher than the forward pin. In 1937, J. Stevens Arms Co. began phasing in a new action with hammers that rotate around an axle. These actions were marked 5000 and 5100.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Palmetto State Armory AR-15 package
location: North of QC's, West of Rockford, Quad Cities, Illinois
postcontent:
I have for sale a slightly used Palmetto State Armory AR 15 with a 16" 1:7 twist chrome lined barrel, carbine length gas system, and m4 feed ramps. This is the same rifle as the PSA 16" M4 Premium Carbine. It was purchased as a separate flat top upper assembly and a separate lower receiver and parts kit. I assembled it myself. The lower receiver is marked "multi" and can fire both 5.56 Nato and .223 Rem ammo. It comes with a Rock River Arms chrome bolt carrier group.  This rifle has 200 rounds through it (170 rounds of .223 with 40 rounds being steel cased ammo, and 30 rounds of XM855 5.56x45 62 grain ammo.) without a single malfunction of any sort. It comes with 430 rounds of ammo (390 rounds of Federal XM855 5.56x45mm 62 grain FMJ ball ammo in the ammo can, 1 box of Winchester Ranger 60 grain .223, and 1 box of Herter's 55 grain steel cased .223) along with 6 magazines (3 steel magazines with gray magpul followers, 2 steel magazines with green followers, and one Gen2 PMAG). This rifle comes with an A2 rear sight with dual aperture for both close range and longer range shooting. The rifle will come in a US PeaceKeeper nylon zip case with 4 pouches for magazines and a zip-shut pocket for other necessities while you are at the range.

There was a spot on the ejection port side (right side) where tool marks were left while installing the roll pin while assembling the trigger guard. The spot was touched up with an off brand (not birchwood casey) gun bluing by a buddy of mine....but it is still able to be seen. I've attempted to show the spot in the last picture. It could be touched up with some aluminum black for a better match with the rest of the finish. In no way does this compromise the safety or function of the firearm. Other than that, this rifle is in fantastic shape with very few other handling marks (one on the opposite side of the trigger guard, and one by the bolt catch from my ring). More pictures are available if you are interested.

I have over $1,600 into this package. That said, I don't expect anybody to pay what I paid for it since prices were still inflated. $925 firm cash price. I am not looking to travel a great distance for this sale, but with that said I go to the IL QC's 5 days a week for work. Would also travel as far east as Rockford...possibly DeKalb if you are from a suburb where this firearm is legal to own. I would consider selling to an Iowa or Wisconsin resident if you are willing to cover ffl costs on your end of things and shipping. The only trades I'm looking for are a Ruger 10/22 model 1168 or 1102 in good shape, a "budget" 1911 preferably in 9mm but would consider 45 or perhaps even a 22 l.r. (i.e. $500 Rock Island Armory 1911 Tactical 9mm, Remington, Citadel, Girsan, American Classic....no Taurus) with a skeletonized trigger and hammer, Springfield Armory XDS in 9mm, Springfield Armory XDm 3.8 compact in 9mm, or a Glock 19 Gen 3, perhaps a S&W M&P 15-22 with the balance to be covered in cash. Looking for a single firearm plus cash trade or outright sale. All State and Federal laws apply (24 hour wait or 72 hours if a handgun is part of the trade, valid FOID card, record of transfer, ffl transfer for non-residents, etc).

title: For Sale/Trade:  TNW Aero Survival Rifle- takes Glock 9mm mags
postcontent:
Selling a barely used (less than 100 rounds) Aero Survival Rifle (ASR) by TNW Firearms, made right here in Vernonia.  If you aren't familiar with this gun, that's ok.  I wasn't either until a few weeks ago.  Saw one for sale at Fisherman's and after doing a little research I had to have it.  Only getting rid of it because I've bought too many guns over the last few months and my bank account is starting to not appreciate that.   Check out Youtube  or Google and you will find more info on the gun.

This is a very unique "AR-ish" style rifle that breaks down to just over 17 inches by unscrewing the barrel.  The removal takes about 10 seconds.  It is extremely light and very backpack-friendly.  If you're in the market for a Keltec Sub2000 (I have one of those for sale too) this is a great alternative with some distinct advantages.

-Uses any Glock 9mm mags, including 33-rounders, 17, 15, or even little subcompact 10-rounders.  The Keltec can't do that.
-Can be converted to .40 or .45 with kits from TNW
-Pistol Grip and adjustable buttstock are standard AR parts so can be easily changed to what you want.
-Picatinny rail on top for mounting whatever optics you want.  Contrary  to other reviews, mine did not come with the cheap NCStar scope.
-Picatinny bottom rail for foregrip, light, etc
-Reversible ejection port for lefties!
-Ambidextrous single-point sling attachments

Includes:
Gun
One 15-round aftermarket magazine
Box and paperwork

**I have 2 factory Glock 33-round mags available for $50 each**

I'm not looking to profit here, just break even.  I paid $699+$10 background fee for it just a few weeks ago at Fisherman's Marine in Tigard.  Please let me know if you have any specific questions about the gun, I'll be glad to answer.  

FTF only, no shipping or out of state transactions.  Will verify Oregon ID to prove residence.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Marlin Model 60 .22lr Rifle, 1982 mfg.
postcontent:
I've got a very nice 1985 Marlin Model 60 rifle up for sale. Here are some of the important things: 

* Manufactured in 1982. This means it's got the more desirable 22 inch barrel and 18 rd. tube. Later models had the mag cut to 15 in the late 80's, and the barrel was chopped three inches in 2000-ish to match it.

* ~85% finish left on the barrel and furniture. No rust, but a few small dings in the stock from 30 years of existence and a little big of finish wear on the receiver edges. Definitely not a safe queen, but miles ahead of a truck or hunting gun. 

* Brass mag tube. Early mag tubes were steel, and caused rust issues. 

*  Fixed leaf sights: make anything inside of 50 yards your bitch, but a little bit of holding and tweaking of your POA will be required to nail that squirrel at 350 feet on a moonless night. 

* Strong, clear rifling. This gun has been used, but never been neglected. No rust or gross stuff. 

I'm asking $145 or an interesting trade. I'm pretty open as to what an interesting trade is. I prefer face to face deals and I'll drive a reasonable distance from my home in near-Westside Cleveland to do the deal, and can ship UPS to any C&R holder or FFL dealer you wanna work with. Buyer pays all transfer and shipping fees. I don't charge for boxing or time. 

More pictures available upon request.
Thanks for reading!

title: For Sale:  brass cleaning and depriming
postcontent:
hello, I am offering to take care of the hassle of cleaning old dirty brass for anyone. I do a two stage cleaning one with the traditional tumbler and the second with a sonic tank cleaner. if interested let me know what caliber and approximant round count. 
basic price guide:
$20 for up to 500 rounds of short action(example.. 223 length), 1000 small pistol(example 9mm size casings)  ect...
larger calibers will be an additional $5 for standard action(example.. 30-06 length), $10 for long action(example.. 300 win mag length)
if you would like me to deprime the cases for you it will be an extra $5 per hundred.
thank you for your time
-John

postcontent:
Kit Includes: 4x32MM RANGE FINDER RETICLE MINI-SCOPE & ONE INCH SCOPE RINGS -

$69.00 Includes Free Shipping

HOW TO ORDER:

To order this scope kit please reply to this ad with scope kit ID number (HEN432RF), your name and USPS MAILING address. We will email you a PayPal purchase invoice for $69.00 with instructions on how to pay with your PayPal account or a credit card through PayPal. As an alternative you can send a USPS Money Order with the purchase information to our address which will be included in the invoice.

$69.00 Includes Free Priority Mail Shipping to Any US Address

NO FIREARMS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS SALE !!
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =

This scope kit is specifically designed to fit the following Henry rimfire lever and pump action rifles models:  H001, H001L, H001Y, H001M, H001V, H001T, H001TM, H001TV, H003T and H003TM. 

This scope kit DOES NOT FIT the Henry Golden Boy series which require a special barrel mount available from Henry Repeating Arms Company.

The RANGE FINDER reticle can be used to estimate the range to your target and the smaller scope profile makes it easier to carry your rifle in the field or fit it into a scabbard or gun case.

We test a variety of scope and mount combinations on RIFLES until we find a scope package that works best for a particular rifle and application - and this is an excellent mini-scope and mounting system for your Henry rimfire rifle. 

SCOPE SPECIFICATIONS:
+ Magnification: 4X 
+ Objective: 32 mm
+ Length: 7.75" 
+ Weight: 11 oz
+ Reticle: Mil-Dot with integral Range Finder
+ Eye Relief: 3 Inch eye relief provides safety from recoil and enables fast target acquisition
+ Windage & Elevation Adjustments: 1/4" @100 Yards
+ Field of View (feet at 100 yds.): 36.6
+ Tube Diameter: 1"
+ Shock Proof – Heavy Duty Recoil Design 
+ Nitrogen filled - fog and water proof with weather resistant seals
+ Bright Optics
+ Multi-coated lenses provides superior light transmission and resolution
+ Eye Piece Focus Ring with Sharp Focusing 
+ Finish: Matte Black
+ See-Thru Protective Lens Caps Included
+ New in Box with Manufacturer’s Limited Lifetime Replacement Warranty 

RINGS SPECIFICATIONS:
+ One Inch Diameter for 3/8 Inch grooved receivers
+ Lightweight Non-slip Aluminum
+ Medium Height
+ Matte Black Finish
+ New Scope Rings with Manufacturer’s Replacement Warranty
+ Note: Rings Style May Vary Slightly from those shown in Photos

REPLACEMENT WARRANTIES:

The individual components of this SCOPE KIT are warranted by their respective manufacturers to be free of defects by reasons of workmanship and/or defective materials. The warranties do not cover damage caused by improper installation, abuse or accidents and no other warranties are offered or implied. If one or more of the components fails to function properly and/or is found to be otherwise defective it/they will be repaired or replaced as follows:

NOTE: Please contact seller FIRST for return instructions of any defective components. 

* Scope: Buyer must return the scope to the manufacturer for inspection and testing. If found to be defective, the manufacturer will repair or replace the scope and return it directly to the purchaser. NOTE: Contact manufacturer for return instructions BEFORE returning a scope for warranty repair.

* Mount and Rings: Buyer must return the mounting rings to the seller for inspection and testing. If found to be defective, the seller will replace return them directly to the purchaser. NOTE: Contact seller BEFORE returning a mount or rings for warranty repair.

* No other warranties are offered or implied and cash refunds are not offered by the seller.

SHIPPING: 
NOTE: WE do not have a retail store and do not offer pick-up services.

+ Please insure that your address and telephone number are correct.

+ If you have a street address, but your mail is delivered to a US Post Office Box, please use the US Post Office Box as your mailing address.
+ Address should be certified by PayPal. If NOT certified, we will ship to the address specified by PayPal, but will not be responsible for shipping to the wrong address.
